Author: LacedWithIce
Text: These are the moments that define you. Your inner struggle is intense and you see that and are able to step out and look at the emotional upset in a logical state and choose to shift your emotions until they align with your truth. It’s an amazing skill that few are aware of and the benefits of consistently battling that inner struggle and doing so with success though a large amount of the time it won’t be easy, this is going to give you strength and build even more resilience than you have now.   You’re the one who gets the last say. Say something that lasts! ;)   Sending good vibes!

Author: 3cats_in_atrenchcoat
Text: It sounds like you where able to get yourself out of a really bad headspace and move on to a peaceful place. That’s a success right there.
